job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtlooking for a data scientist to work with financial data on a great team and a fantastic organization you can work remotely but would prefer someone in the tampa bay areaampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis role will support multiple divisions within the organization the focus of this role includes using data to develop and deliver the information necessary for making business decisions and providing actionable intelligence that allows senior management to better manage the businessampnbspthis person should be able to interpret data analyzing results using various techniques and extracting information which can offer ways to improve products and business approaches thus influencing business decisions you will lead projects including communications with it as well as key business stakeholdersampnbspyou will provide the sales leaders data they need to guide the business from models built based on current statisticsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtrequirementsltpgtltulgtltligtprefer years using data to build models to provide to business leaders but will consider those with years of data science experience as wellltligtltligtfamiliarity with statistical modeling techniquesltligtltligtfamiliarity with statistical and general programming languages such as r andor python python preferredltligtltligtmust have solid sql experienceampnbspampnbspltligtltligtcustomer centric analysis profitability analysis and modelingltligtltligtbachelors degree required masters a plusltligtltligtable to work independently with minimum supervisionampnbspampnbspampnbspltligtltligtable to maintain confidentiality of sensitive informationampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspltligtltligtprefer someone who lives in tampa bay arealtligtltligtmust live in the et or ct time zonesltligtltligtno rd parties no sponsorship availableltligtltulgt
